LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartHuge.label: animal heart (huge)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartHuge.description:
Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyHuge.label: animal kidney (huge)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyHuge.description:
Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverHuge.label: animal liver (huge)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverHuge.description:
Plays an important role in metabolism.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungHuge.label: animal lung (huge)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungHuge.description:
Essential part of the respiratory system.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperHuge.label: animal painstopper (huge)
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperHuge.description:
This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmHuge.label: bionic animal arm (huge)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmHuge.description:
One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarHuge.label: bionic animal ear (huge)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarHuge.description:
An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeHuge.label: bionic animal eye (huge)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeHuge.description:
Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegHuge.label: bionic animal leg (huge)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegHuge.description:
Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmHuge.label: prosthetic animal arm (huge)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmHuge.descriptio:
Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegHuge.label: prosthetic animal leg (huge)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegHuge.descriptio:
Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.
